extendedInfo.description: Not only Pass Exam 70-680, but MASTER THE MATERIAL.The absolute best exam simulation / study system available.Because of our 5-TIER SYSTEM, you are able to decide how much detail you need to efficiently learn the material you need to master.Tier 1: Question / Answer SimulationTier 2: Quick Explanation of the AnswerTier 3: Link to a VERY DETAILED explanationTier 4: Reference Sites so that you can study in depth the concept presentedTier 5: Many of our questions have links to VIDEO tutorials explaining the material in depth.This exam simulation / study system will help you get your Microsoft Certified Technology Specialist (MCTS) certification! This exam is also good towards the MCITP certification as well.This is hands down the best way to get certified! Our authors are actual certification boot-camp istructors that know how to get the job done.Revolutionary study system for:Candidates for this exam operate in computing environments that use Microsoft Windows 7 as a desktop operating system in an enterprise environment. Candidates should have at least one year of experience in the IT field, as well as experience implementing and administering any Windows client operating system in a networked environment.Audience ProfileCandidates for this exam operate in computing environments that use Microsoft Windows 7 as a desktop operating system in an enterprise environment. Candidates should have at least one year of experience in the IT field, as well as experience implementing and administering any Windows client operating system in a networked environment.Candidates should be able to install, deploy, and upgrade to Windows 7, including ensuring hardware and software compatibility. Additionally, candidates should be able to configure pre-installation and post-installation system settings, Windows security features, network connectivity applications included with Windows 7, and mobile computing. Candidates should also be able to maintain systems, including monitoring for and resolving performance and reliability issues. Candidates should have a basic understanding of  Windows PowerShell syntax.  Credit Toward CertificationWhen you pass Exam 70-680: TS: Windows 7, Configuring, you complete the requirements for the following certification(s):â¢MCTS: Windows 7, ConfigurationExam 70-680: TS: Windows 7, Configuring: counts as credit toward the following certification(s):â¢MCITP: Enterprise Administratorâ¢MCITP: Enterprise Desktop Administrator 7â¢MCITP: Enterprise Desktop Support Technician 7

reviews.title: Questions & Answers
reviews.comment: What a waste of my money. No updates nor additions. Do not buy nor waste your time nor money with this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Money Wasted & Angry
reviews.comment: Will not open on my Razr running ICS and Apex Launcher - keep getting \"Unfortunately, 70-680 will close\" when the main menu appears.  Tried to email Examshout at the email address on the app\'s Google Play page, no dice.  Received \"recipient domain rejected your message\".  App won\'t run and no support?  Waste of money.  DO NOT BUY.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Quiz on the go
reviews.comment: Great way to study for the exam when ever you have a spare moment.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Won\'t load
reviews.comment: The thing won\'t load. What else is there to say, junk?!!
reviews.author: Siavash Hazini

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Passed another exam with you guys. Great product with excellent explanations.
